allow: Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from services.crypto_service import CryptoService; print\(''Import OK''\)")
Bash(cmd //c "venv\\Scripts\\python -c ""from services.crypto_service import CryptoService; print\(''Import OK''\)""")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete trading dashboard roadmap - tactical controls, priority scanning, AI insights

## New Features

### Tactical Control Bar
- Emergency Close All \(2-click confirmation\)
- Pause New Entries toggle
- Strategy Override dropdown \(Conservative/Moderate/Aggressive\)

### Priority Tier System for Smart Scanning
- Tier 1 \(HIGH\): 3-second scans for high volatility/news
- Tier 2 \(STANDARD\): 30-second scans for normal watchlist
- Tier 3 \(LOW\): 3-minute scans for consolidating symbols
- Dynamic tier promotion/demotion based on metrics

### Strategy Labels
- Added SCALP and INTRADAY to TradeType enum
- Time horizon badges on AI Decision cards

### Execution Log & Paper Trade Debugging
- Comprehensive execution event logging
- /api/bot/execution-log endpoint
- /api/bot/strong-buy-trace for debugging

### UI Components
- Asset Class Toggle \(Crypto/Stocks/Both\)
- AI Intelligence Sidebar with Decisions/Analysis/Scan tabs
- Ticker Carousel with quick-flip navigation
- Confidence Score Reasoning Modal with weight breakdown

### New API Endpoints
- POST /api/bot/pause-entries
- POST /api/bot/strategy-override
- POST /api/bot/emergency-close-all
- GET /api/bot/priority-tiers
- GET /api/bot/execution-log
- GET /api/bot/strong-buy-trace

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete trading dashboard roadmap - tactical controls, priority scanning, AI insights

## New Features

### Tactical Control Bar
- Emergency Close All \(2-click confirmation\)
- Pause New Entries toggle
- Strategy Override dropdown \(Conservative/Moderate/Aggressive\)

- Tier 1 \(HIGH\): 3-second scans for high volatility/news
- Tier 2 \(STANDARD\): 30-second scans for normal watchlist

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name python*,uvicorn* 2>$null | Stop-Process -Force 2>$null; Write-Host ''Killed all Python processes''")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Enhanced pattern analysis with timeframe switching, buy/sell zones, Elliott Wave AI insights

- Pattern Analysis: Fixed timeframe buttons \(5m, 15m, 1H, 1D\) to actually change data
- Pattern consolidation: Doji and other candlestick patterns now consolidated \(no duplicates\)
- Overall sentiment summary: Shows STRONGLY BULLISH/BEARISH/MIXED with dominant signal
- Entry zones: Patterns now show buy/sell price RANGES, not just targets
- Timeframe relevance: Patterns weighted appropriately \(candlesticks better for short-term\)
- Elliott Wave: Added trading actions \(STRONG_BUY, COVER_SHORT, HOLD, etc.\)
- Elliott Wave: Added buy/sell zones for each wave position
- Elliott Wave: AI reasoning explains why wave count is what it is
- Elliott Wave: Fibonacci targets \(1.618 ext, 38.2% ret, 61.8% ret\)
- Crypto patterns: Added /api/crypto/patterns endpoint with same features
- Removed duplicate Elliott Wave standalone component \(keeping tabbed version\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
